title: UPDATED CLIENT FREEZING ON 28 SECONDS CHAMP SELECT
body: Hi guys, The new client got automatically updated for me today (ty rito) i have tried to play a ranked game 3 separate times today all of which get into champ select then freeze on 28 second timer of the first ban? Plus the Alpha client won't load for me again. Someone please help. Normal games load perfectly fine it's just ranked champ select.

replies.body: report the bug and hope for the best. my alpha client currently freezes on log in or when accepting queues :')
